title: Bug 37021 - Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. To reproduce the problem, please run the code provided in 'tests/new/binaryWarnings/..'. Please note that these tests may return false positives due to the lack of filename checking in harness verification of messages. In AJDT, it seems that the filename is omitted when it doesn't make sense to AJDT.
OB: When targeting .class files from injars, the source path in declare warning messages is shown in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. Sometimes the filenames do not appear at all, although these specific tests do not reproduce that problem.
EB: When targeting .class files from injars, the source path in declare warning messages should be displayed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'.
SR:
1. Run the provided code in 'tests/new/binaryWarnings/..' 
2. Observe the declare warning messages 
3. Confirm that the source path is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'
